description: ff. 61. 211 x 156; 157 x 106 mm. 23 lin. - the third autogr. copy made by the author, Jumādá II, 994. Brockelmann, GAL, I, 491 (commentary 4); S I, 676 - the commentator completed his work 17 Shawwāl 984. Incip.:... وبعد فىقول ... قد سألنى ولدى عبد الوهاب
author: Shinshawrī, ʻAbd Allāh ibn Muḥammad, 1528 or 9-1590 or 91.
